DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This page contains brief information about mirvetuximab soravtansine-gynx and a collection of links to more information about the use of this drug, research results, and ongoing clinical trials.
DrugInfoMetaData.FDAExternalRef: FDA label information for this drug is available at DailyMed.

Para.ExternalRef: FDA label information for this drug is available at DailyMed.

Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Mirvetuximab soravtansine-gynx is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Ovarian epithelial, fallopian tube, or primary peritoneal cancer that is folate receptorâ€“alpha positive. It is used in adults whose cancer did not respond to or is no longer responding to platinum chemotherapy and who have received one to three types of systemic therapy.

Section.Para: Mirvetuximab soravtansine-gynx is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.

Section.Title: Clinical Trials Accepting Patients
Section.Para: Find Clinical Trials for Mirvetuximab Soravtansine - Check for trials from NCI's list of cancer clinical trials now accepting patients.

DrugInfoDisclaimer.Para: Important: The drug information on this page is meant to be educational. It is not a substitute for medical advice. The information may not cover all possible uses, actions, interactions, or side effects of this drug, or precautions to be taken while using it. Please see your health care professional for more information about your specific medical condition and the use of this drug.
